overview: Right after the Civil War, an ex-Union soldier sets out to become a schoolmaster in his small town, even though many locals still harbor a resentment against "Yankees". He goes up against the town bully, who both want the same girl, and his troubles multiply when a vicious band of nightriders set out to drive him out of town.
tagline: OUT OF THE BOOK..INTO THE SCREEN AND INTO YOUR HEART
title: The Hoosier Schoolmaster
